attributes.action: World leaders in the boxing ring.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All world leaders should work out their differences in a boxing ring. 
Its them who have the problem with other countries, not us the people, we just get dragged in and innocents get killed.
Besides the world leaders arn't in the firing line anyways... they have bunkers and body guards to protect them! So who bares the brunt of a nuclear war? 
If two leaders have a squabble then they should fight it out KNOCKOUT style, or in a cage. I would pay alot to see that. 
Last man/woman standing wins
That seems much fairer then sanctionos or war against, what is at the moment, ah yes terror. what a load of rubbish. i have more chance of killing myself than being killed by a so-called terrorist. 
One mans terrorist is another mans freedom fighter.
Sign this patition and let the masses speak. 

thank you

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
